entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
